pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, May 22, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, May 22, 2016:

Ottawa

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Mrs. Gr√©goire Trudeau will depart for Tokyo, Japan.

Canada Reception Centre
Hangar 11
190 Convair Private
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 11:15 a.m.
  • Photo opportunity only
